achievements.description: Developed and managed a production efficiency monitoring system using Python for OEE estimation, optimizing machine utilization across multiple workstations.
Built Industry 4.0 solutions with tree-based optimization algorithms and real-time dashboards, accelerating product development by 75%.
Created interactive visualization and reporting tools with MySQL and PyQt, reducing manual work by 50% and improving operational accuracy.
Developed a cross-country domain-specific chatbot system using LangChain, RAG, LLMs, and Azure AI Services, improving troubleshooting efficiency by 70% and boosting production output (UPPD) by 9%
Conducted large-scale data ETL and processing using Azure Databricks to process 20B+ data points, improving debugging efficiency by 70% and saving US$1.2M annually
Built an NLP-based resume recommendation system leveraging machine learning to match candidates with job descriptions and identify top talent.
